# resetSceneReconstruction

**Type Property**

An option to reset the scene mesh.

## Declaration

```swift
static var resetSceneReconstruction: ARSession.RunOptions { get }
```

## Discussion

When you reset scene reconstruction, ARKit removes any existing mesh anchors ([doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARMeshAnchor]) from the session.

## Run Options

- **resetTracking**: An option to reset the device’s position from the session’s previous run.
- **removeExistingAnchors**: An option to remove any anchor objects associated with the session’s previous run.
- **stopTrackedRaycasts**: An option to stop all active tracked raycasts.
